title: Polaroid SX-70
description: My first ever pack of instant film. The unpredictability was equal parts frustrating and exciting. Looking forward to the next one!

images.title: Silo
images.caption: A silo in Rehoboth, MA.

images.title: Fed Building
images.caption: Captured on a cold day outside South Station in Boston, MA. The development went a little sideways. It was likely a combination of the cold weather and gunked up rollers.

images.title: Storefronts in Attleboro, MA
images.caption: Taken from atop a parking garage.

images.title: Chapin Sands
images.caption: Ripples in the sand during low tide. Shot in Dennis, MA.

images.title: Succulent
images.caption: Testing out the SX-70's close-up capabilities.

title: The Great Divide Mountain Bike Route
description: Images captured between Canada and Mexico along the spine of the Rockies from my bicycle.

images.title: Red Meadow Lake
images.caption: The view from our tent at Red Meadow Lake above Whitefish, MT.

images.title: Red Meadow Lake 2
images.caption: An unusual color cast over the mountain after a raging hail storm.

images.title: Atop Stemple Pass
images.caption: My reward for a grueling climb. An incredible view followed by a white-knuckle descent.

images.title: Gravelly Range Road
images.caption: A fire detour sent me down this incredible road.

images.title: Gravelly Range Road 2
images.caption: Just before arriving at the warmest hospitality of Barbara Nye and John Keller.

images.title: Outside South Pass City, WY
images.caption: Captured just before arriving in the collapsed mining town of South Pass City, followed by Atlantic City.

images.title: Outside South Pass City, WY 2
images.caption: Boundless nothingness.

images.title: Coulter Bay
images.caption: A 10-stop ND filter captures movement in the clouds above the Tetons.

title: Colombia
description: A selection of photographs from Medellin, Jardin, Salento, and the Amazon.

images.title: Paramos
images.caption: One of the most unique sights I've ever seen.

images.title: In the Clouds
images.caption: Looking back down from the heavens.

images.title: Finca Argentina
images.caption: Our farmstay the day before the ascent up to 16,000'.

images.title: Bikers
images.caption: Sending a corner in the night.

images.title: Roots
images.caption: Enormous buttress roots on the floor of the Amazon.

images.title: 99 Pesos
images.caption: A bustling marketplace in Medellin.

images.title: Helping Hand
images.caption: A parent and child pass beneath a bridge.

title: Italy
